analysis.key_quote: These blatantly illegal attempts to fire careers civil servants only undermine the services and programs that assist everyday Americans and also dissuade talented people to join the agencies that elevate the quality of life and the knowledge of our great country.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the legality and impact of mass firings on civil service effectiveness and public services, indicating a defense of merit-based systems and employee rights.
